body_html:
No, same thing when setting is_training=True on the restored net.

And BTW, isn't the purpose of the is_training argument to batch normalization to "integrate" the learned mean and std into the layer during interference?
body_text:
No, same thing when setting is_training=True on the restored net.
And BTW, isn't the purpose of the is_training argument to batch normalization to "integrate" the learned mean and std into the layer during interference?
body:
No, same thing when setting is_training=True on the restored net.

And BTW, isn't the purpose of the `is_training` argument to batch normalization to "integrate" the learned mean and std into the layer during interference?
